smartGenSWVersion.name: smartGenSWVersion
smartGenSWVersion.description: ASCII string for description and display of the smart device software version.

smartGenOSVersion.name: smartGenOSVersion
smartGenOSVersion.description: ASCII string for description and display of the smart device operating system (kernel) version.

smartGenSoftwareDscr.name: smartGenSoftwareDscr
smartGenSoftwareDscr.description: ASCII string for description and display of the smart device software information.

smartGenBootVersion.name: smartGenBootVersion
smartGenBootVersion.description: ASCII string for description and display of the smart device boot software version.

smartGenReset.name: smartGenReset
smartGenReset.description: Setting the value of this attribute to ON is interpreted as a reset command for the whole device. It initiates a complete re-initialization of the device.

smartGenHardwareVersion.name: smartGenHardwareVersion
smartGenHardwareVersion.description: ASCII string for description and display of the agent hardware version.

smartGenMonitoringPort.name: smartGenMonitoringPort
smartGenMonitoringPort.description: Enables a user to fix one port to monitor other segment ports. For the moment, the monitoring port is port 16. In this case, this port doesn't participate to any other functions of the device.

smartGenMonitoredPort.name: smartGenMonitoredPort
smartGenMonitoredPort.description: Value '0' is illegal when Monitor Mode is on.

smartGenLastChange.name: smartGenLastChange
smartGenLastChange.description: This attribute contains the value of sysUpTime at the time any change pertaining to the device: The changes are regarding the parameters of this group and any parameters of smartIfExtensionTable.

smartGenNetworkPrefix.name: smartGenNetworkPrefix
smartGenNetworkPrefix.description: For ATM devices, the prefix of the switch connected.

smartGenConnectMode.name: smartGenConnectMode
smartGenConnectMode.description: Enables the user to configure the ATM interface of the smart device to work in front another ATM port of a smart device: pvc or in front a switch with lane10.

smartGenPvcVP.name: smartGenPvcVP
smartGenPvcVP.description: When the smart device is in mode pvc, the VP on which the data is runing.

smartGenPvcVC.name: smartGenPvcVC
smartGenPvcVC.description: When the smart device is in mode pvc, the VC on which the data is runing.

smartGenSlotNumber.name: smartGenSlotNumber
smartGenSlotNumber.description: Identifies the location (slot number) of the device in the chassis. The first slot is 1

smartGenHubMgmtIfType.name: smartGenHubMgmtIfType
smartGenHubMgmtIfType.description: This attribute describes one of the interfaces of agents existing on modules and their type. Value 'none' defines the lack of an interface whose type is recognized by the management console. Any other value defines an interface whose type is recognized by the management console and may be used as a management channel.

smartGenHubAddr.name: smartGenHubAddr
smartGenHubAddr.description: This attribute defines an unique address by which the agent may be addressed by the management console. The address format should be consistent with the type defined by chAgHubMgmtIfType.

smartAgCoprocCommStatus.name: smartAgCoprocCommStatus
smartAgCoprocCommStatus.description: Attribute describing the status of the communication between the agent and its coprocessor.

smartAgCommDebugMode.name: smartAgCommDebugMode
smartAgCommDebugMode.description: Attribute describing the agent mode in which communication problem traps are sent to managers (value 'on') or are not sent to managers (value 'off').

smartAgConfigChangeTraps.name: smartAgConfigChangeTraps
smartAgConfigChangeTraps.description: The value of this attributes determines whether or not the agent sends Configuration Change traps to the manager.

smartAgFaultTraps.name: smartAgFaultTraps
smartAgFaultTraps.description: The value of this attributes determines whether or not the agent sends Fault traps to the manager.

smartAgLaneFaultTraps.name: smartAgLaneFaultTraps
smartAgLaneFaultTraps.description: The value of this attributes determines whether or not the agent sends Fault traps when it cannot connect to some ELAN to the manager.

smartAgSoftwareStatus.name: smartAgSoftwareStatus
smartAgSoftwareStatus.description: Describes configuration of the firmware on this agent. unLoadable(1) - is returned by agents which do not support the Software Download feature; loaded(2) - is returned by agents with loaded software; downLoading(3) - when the attribute is set to this value by manager, it triggers the Software Download procedure. When procedure finished, agent software will reestablish value 'loaded(2)'. downLoadOfDownload (4) - when the attribute is set to this value by manager, it causes the Agent to download the new download software. When procedure finished, agent software will reestablish value 'loaded(2)'.

smartIfExtensionTable.name: smartIfExtensionTable
smartIfExtensionTable.description: This table contains additional information concerning physical interfaces. (Ethernet and ATM ports.)

smartIfExtensionActivity.name: smartIfExtensionActivity
smartIfExtensionActivity.description: Valid for ATM Type supporting redundancy.

smartIfExtensionViNet.name: smartIfExtensionViNet
smartIfExtensionViNet.description: Virtual Net Number. Value '0' for generic mode. The value for not supported is 511.

smartIfExtensionPriorityLevel.name: smartIfExtensionPriorityLevel
smartIfExtensionPriorityLevel.description: This attribute defines the priority levels of Ethernet ports. The highest priority is video.

smartIfExtensionBridgeEnable.name: smartIfExtensionBridgeEnable
smartIfExtensionBridgeEnable.description: Valid for Ethernet port when in sniffer mode.

smartIfExtensionBackPressure.name: smartIfExtensionBackPressure
smartIfExtensionBackPressure.description: Enables a user to disable the backpressure mechanism.

smartIfExtensionSTAEnable.name: smartIfExtensionSTAEnable
smartIfExtensionSTAEnable.description: Allows user to take out a port from the STA.

smartViNetMaxNumOfNets.name: smartViNetMaxNumOfNets
smartViNetMaxNumOfNets.description: Maximum number of local ViNets supported.

smartViNetCurrentBridge.name: smartViNetCurrentBridge
smartViNetCurrentBridge.description: ViNet that is the current owner of the STA group, and forwarding table in the bridge MIB.

smartViNetTable.name: smartViNetTable
smartViNetTable.description: This table contains the number of members belonging to each virtual nets .

smartViNetEntry.name: smartViNetEntry
smartViNetEntry.description: Each Virtual Net will be an isolated entity. The first row of this table is the generic virtual net and is read-only.

smartViNetNumberPlusOne.name: smartViNetNumberPlusOne
smartViNetNumberPlusOne.description: Correspondance for Virtual Net: ViNet: zero is 'generic'

smartViNetElanTable.name: smartViNetElanTable
smartViNetElanTable.description: This table contains all the information concerning the association between virtual nets and ELAN name.

smartViNetElanEntry.name: smartViNetElanEntry
smartViNetElanEntry.description: Each Virtual Net will be associated to an ELAN. The vinet = 0 is the first entry of the device.

smartViNetElanAssociation.name: smartViNetElanAssociation
smartViNetElanAssociation.description: The association number. For the first association, this entry is read-only.

smartViNetElanViNet.name: smartViNetElanViNet
smartViNetElanViNet.description: The virtual net number. For the first row, this entry is read-only.

smartViNetElanName.name: smartViNetElanName
smartViNetElanName.description: The ELAN name. For the first row, this entry is 'default' and is read-only.

smartViNetElanEntryStatus.name: smartViNetElanEntryStatus
smartViNetElanEntryStatus.description: The status of the entry. When the console starts to set the parameters of the row, the agent sets the status to notReady. The status createAndWait is set by the console, when the row is complete. After reset of the device, the row is 'active(1)'. When the console has to delete a row, it sets the status to 'destroy'. After reset, the row should disappear.

smartViNetElanIfIndex.name: smartViNetElanIfIndex
smartViNetElanIfIndex.description: Creating a row in this table causes the agent to add one row in the interface table. Before setting the row status to active, the agent fill this field with the value of the ifIndex of the new created row.

smartViNetFdbTable.name: smartViNetFdbTable
smartViNetFdbTable.description: This table is the forwarding table per virtual net.

smartViNetFdbEntry.name: smartViNetFdbEntry
smartViNetFdbEntry.description: The forwarding tables. The smartViNetFdbPlusOne = 1 corresponds to ViNet generic.

smartViNetFdbPlusOne.name: smartViNetFdbPlusOne
smartViNetFdbPlusOne.description: This table is indexed by the virtual net number plus 1, since the first group is '0'.

smartViNetFdbAddress.name: smartViNetFdbAddress
smartViNetFdbAddress.description: A unicast MAC address for which the bridge has forwarding and/or filtering information.

smartViNetFdbPort.name: smartViNetFdbPort
smartViNetFdbPort.description: Either the value '0', or the port number of the port on which a frame having a source address equal to the value of the corresponding instance of dot1dTpFdbAddress has been seen. A value of '0' indicates that the port number has not been learned but that the bridge does have some forwarding/filtering information about this address (e.g. in the dot1dStaticTable). Implementors are encouraged to assign the port value to this object whenever it is learned even for addresses for which the corresponding value of dot1dTpFdbStatus is not learned(3).

smartViNetStpTable.name: smartViNetStpTable
smartViNetStpTable.description: This table contains all the information concerning the STA parameters per group.

smartViNetStpEntry.name: smartViNetStpEntry
smartViNetStpEntry.description: The bridge will function between each of those entries.

smartViNetStpPlusOne.name: smartViNetStpPlusOne
smartViNetStpPlusOne.description: This table is indexed by the virtual net number plus 1, since the first group is '0'.

smartViNetStpTimeSinceTopologyChange.name: smartViNetStpTimeSinceTopologyChange
smartViNetStpTimeSinceTopologyChange.description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the last time a topology change was detected by the bridge entity.

smartViNetStpTopChanges.name: smartViNetStpTopChanges
smartViNetStpTopChanges.description: The total number of topology changes detected by this bridge since the management entity was last reset or initialized.

smartViNetStpDesignatedRoot.name: smartViNetStpDesignatedRoot
smartViNetStpDesignatedRoot.description: The bridge identifier of the root of the spanning tree as determined by the Spanning Tree Protocol as executed by this node. This value is used as the Root Identifier parameter in all Configuration Bridge PDUs originated by this node.

smartViNetStpRootCost.name: smartViNetStpRootCost
smartViNetStpRootCost.description: The cost of the path to the root as seen from this bridge.

smartViNetStpRootPort.name: smartViNetStpRootPort
smartViNetStpRootPort.description: The port number of the port which offers the lowest cost path from this bridge to the root bridge.

smartViNetStpMaxAge.name: smartViNetStpMaxAge
smartViNetStpMaxAge.description: The maximum age of Spanning Tree Protocol information learned from the network on any port before it is discarded, in units of hundredths of a second. This is the actual value that this bridge is currently using.

smartViNetStpHelloTime.name: smartViNetStpHelloTime
smartViNetStpHelloTime.description: The amount of time between the transmission of Configuration bridge PDUs by this node on any port when it is the root of the spanning tree or trying to become so, in units of hundredths of a second. This is the actual value that this bridge is currently using.

smartViNetStpHoldTime.name: smartViNetStpHoldTime
smartViNetStpHoldTime.description: This time value determines the interval length during which no more than two Configuration bridge PDUs shall be transmitted by this node, in units of hundredths of a second.

smartViNetStpBridgeHelloTime.name: smartViNetStpBridgeHelloTime
smartViNetStpBridgeHelloTime.description: The value that all bridges use for HelloTime when this bridge is acting as the root. The granularity of this timer is specified by 802.1d/D9 to be 1 second. An agent may return a badValue error if a set is attempted to a value which is not a whole number of seconds.

smartViNetStpLastChange.name: smartViNetStpLastChange
smartViNetStpLastChange.description: This attribute contains the value of sysUpTime at the time any change pertaining to the specified STA occurred.

smartViNetConsoleManagement.name: smartViNetConsoleManagement
smartViNetConsoleManagement.description: The ViNet to which the console belongs to.

smartFatherNumberOfMac.name: smartFatherNumberOfMac
smartFatherNumberOfMac.description: Number of MAC Addresses of the box agent.

smartFatherMacList.name: smartFatherMacList
smartFatherMacList.description: This variable is the list of Mac Addresses of the box agent.

smartLSFTable.name: smartLSFTable
smartLSFTable.description: This table contains the MAC addresses of all LSF100 modules on the FDDI ring. This information is needed for LANNET Topology application.

smartLSFEntry.name: smartLSFEntry
smartLSFEntry.description: A table entry containing MAC addresses of all LSF100 modules on the FDDI ring.

smartLSFMACAddr.name: smartLSFMACAddr
smartLSFMACAddr.description: This item defines the MAC address of an LSF100 connected to the FDDI ring.

smartLSFEntryStatus.name: smartLSFEntryStatus
smartLSFEntryStatus.description: Only the status active(1) is relevant to this table.

macInFrames.name: macInFrames
macInFrames.description: A count of the number of frames received by this MAC.

macCopiedFrames.name: macCopiedFrames
macCopiedFrames.description: A count of the number of frames addressed to and successfully copied into the station's receive buffers by this MAC. This count does not include MAC frames.

macOutFrames.name: macOutFrames
macOutFrames.description: A count of the number of frames trasmitted by this MAC. This count does not include MAC frames.

macTokenRcvd.name: macTokenRcvd
macTokenRcvd.description: A count of the number of times the station has received a token on this MAC.

macErrFrames.name: macErrFrames
macErrFrames.description: A count of the number of frames that were detected in error by this MAC that had not been detected in error by another MAC.

macLostFrames.name: macLostFrames
macLostFrames.description: A count of the number of instances that this MAC detected a format error during frame reception, such that the frame was stripped.

macNotCopiedFrames.name: macNotCopiedFrames
macNotCopiedFrames.description: A count of the number of frames addressed to this MAC but were not copied into the station's receive buffers. This count does not include MAC frames.

macRingOpState.name: macRingOpState
macRingOpState.description: A count of the number of times the ring has entered the Ring Operational state from the Ring Not Operational state.

fddiRingUtilization.name: fddiRingUtilization
fddiRingUtilization.description: A utilization of the FDDI ring, attached to the LSF100 modules (or other members in the family).

comments: Produced by pysmi-0.3.4 at Tue Apr 20 19:39:34 2021
